messages.content: This leaflet was funded and promoted by David Walker on behalf of Nancy Platts

keyPolicies.policyDescription: I will stand up for the NHS. And fight privatisation.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Itâ€™s a three horse race. Every vote is vital - 18300 votes behind Labour, Lib Dems lose deposits, UKIP vote down.

issues.governance: I will stand up for the NHS. And fight privatisation.
issues.health: I will stand up for the NHS. And fight privatisation.

leaflet.personalStatement: Hello, I have campaigned for Labour's general election for nine months now. My job is more difficult because people need protecting from the Tories' cuts.

politicalExperience.achievements: I have brought out scandal after scandal to light.

endorsements.endorsement: Nancy Platts will stand up for all local people just like you have, Nancy.

images.caption: A photograph of the campaign leaflet
